name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SkyNotes: Floating Sticky Notes on new tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create floating sticky notes that appear on every new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay organized and productive with SkyNotes! This Chrome extension lets you create colorful, movable sticky notes that float freely on your screen. Quickly jot down ideas, reminders, and to-dos, and place them anywhere for easy access. With simple drag-and-drop functionality, your notes are always within reach, keeping your workspace clutter-free and efficient.
